title: July - Among Sparrows, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Chop bottom edge in pencil: [Nicolas Africano 1990]; at
description: from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; man seated on chair wearing baggy pants and hat with round brim; three small birds on ground
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
